dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement (Pac-Man)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Hideki Yoshimoto [mailto:hyoshimoto@namcobandaigames.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 06, 2006 9:02 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement (Pac-Man)

March 6, 2006
VIA E-MAIL: copyright@theplanet.com

Attn. Mr. George Poletes
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

Dear Sirs:
 
I am an authorized representative of Namco Ltd., Namco Bandai Games America
Inc., Namco America Inc. and Namco Networks America Inc. ("Namco"), which
publish certain proprietary interactive games for video game consoles,
personal computers, handheld devices and the Internet.
 
I am providing this letter of notification pursuant to the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act and 17 USC
